thread.title: George Osborne facing pressure from Conservative MPs to rethink tax credit cuts
thread.title_full: George Osborne facing pressure from Conservative MPs to rethink tax credit cuts - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: George Osborne facing pressure from Conservative MPs to rethink tax credit cuts
text: George Osborne is under mounting pressure from within his own party to rethink controversial plans to cut tax credits for working families. Former Cabinet minister Andrew Mitchell said the plans to cut £4.4bn from the welfare bill by reducing tax credit payments to more than three million families may be “tweaked” and said he expected the Chancellor would keep an “open mind” on the issue. Read more
